item.title: 美国市场监管机构旨在暂停有关气候信息披露的诉讼
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）代理主席周二表示，该机构正请求法院暂停就一项气候披露规则提起的诉讼，该规则由他的前任通过，并在争议中被迅速搁置。【原文：The acting chair of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said on Tuesday the agency was asking a court to pause proceedings in a lawsuit over a climate disclosure rule that was passed by his predecessor and swiftly stayed amid controversy.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创公司 Positron 募集 2350 万美元种子轮资金，欲与英伟达一较高下
item.description: 旨在与英伟达（Nvidia）竞争的初创芯片制造商 Positron 周二表示，它筹集了 2350 万美元，用于扩大其美国制造的人工智能芯片的生产规模。【原文：Positron, a startup chip maker that aims to compete with Nvidia , said Tuesday it raised $23.5 million to scale production of its U.S.-made artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: 波音公司称在 2023 年以来最繁忙的一月交付了 45 架飞机
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，该公司在 1 月份交付了 45 架飞机，高于上个月的 30 架，这是自 2023 年以来美国飞机制造商交付飞机最多的一个月。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday that it had delivered 45 airplanes in January, up from 30 deliveries the previous month and the most deliveries in a month for the U.S. planemaker since 2023.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔：除美国联邦消费者保护委员会外，没有其他机构负责消费者保护执法工作
item.description: 在一位资深民主党参议员要求确保消费者金融保护局继续获得资金时，美联储主席周二表示，除消费者金融保护局外，没有其他美国监管机构负责确保银行遵守防止欺骗消费者的规定。【原文：No U.S. regulator other than the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is tasked with ensuring that banks abide by rules guarding against deceptive practices regarding consumers, the head of the Federal Reserve said on Tuesday as he was pressed by a senior Democratic senator to ensure the CFPB remains funded.】

item.title: 银行老板预计特朗普执政期间美国政策不确定性仍将持续，但仍看好经济
item.description: 美国银行高管周二表示，随着唐纳德-特朗普总统第二届政府的组建，他们预计政策的不确定性将持续存在，但对经济前景仍持乐观态度。【原文：U.S. bank executives said on Tuesday they expected policy uncertainty to linger as President Donald Trump's second administration takes shape, but remained optimistic on the economic outlook.】

item.title: 埃利奥特斥资 25 亿美元入股菲利普斯 66，推动中游业务出售
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）周二表示，该公司已在美国炼油商菲利普斯 66 公司（Phillips 66）持有超过 25 亿美元的股份，并计划推动该公司的运营变革和中游业务的出售。【原文：Elliott Investment Management said on Tuesday it has built a stake of more than $2.5 billion in U.S. refiner Phillips 66 , and plans to push for operational changes and the sale of the company's midstream business.】

item.title: 美国消费者监察机构执法和监管负责人宣布辞职
item.description: 据路透社看到的内部电子邮件显示，陷入困境的美国消费者金融保护局负责执法和监督的高级官员周二提出辞职，理由是唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府决定停止该机构的所有活动。【原文：The top officials for enforcement and supervision at the embattled U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau tendered their resignations on Tuesday, citing the decision by President Donald Trump's administration to halt all activity at the agency, according to internal emails seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 高盛终止 IPO 多元化承诺
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）周二表示，已终止与该投资银行首次公开募股业务相关的多元化、公平和包容性承诺。【原文：Goldman Sachs said on Tuesday it has ended a diversity, equity and inclusion pledge tied to the investment bank's initial public offering business.】

item.title: 福特首席执行官谴责特朗普关税带来的 "成本和混乱"
item.description: 福特汽车公司首席执行官吉姆-法利（Jim Farley）说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提出并实施的关税增加了 "大量成本和混乱"，尽管法利说他相信总统的目的是加强美国汽车业的整体实力。【原文：Ford Motor CEO Jim Farley said U.S. President Donald Trump's proposed and implemented tariffs have added "a lot of cost and a lot of chaos," although Farley said he believes the president aims to strengthen the American auto industry overall.】

item.title: 欧洲刑警组织称，四名俄罗斯人在打击 Phobos 勒索软件行动中被捕
item.description: 泛欧警察机构欧洲刑警组织（Europol）周二表示，上周逮捕了四名俄罗斯人，他们涉嫌部署 Phobos 勒索软件变种，向欧洲和其他地区的人勒索钱财。【原文：Four Russian nationals, who were suspected of deploying a variant of Phobos ransomware to extort payments from people in Europe and beyond, were arrested last week, the pan-European police agency Europol said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥称美国对墨西哥钢铁和铝征收关税不合理
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长马塞洛-埃布拉德（Marcelo Ebrard）周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对从墨西哥进口的钢铁和铝征收25%的关税是 "不合理的"，因为美国对墨西哥存在钢铁和铝贸易顺差。【原文：The 25% tariff on steel and aluminum imports from Mexico imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump "is not justified" because the U.S. runs a steel and aluminum trade surplus with Mexico, Mexican Economy Minister Marcelo Ebrard said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，苹果与阿里巴巴合作在中国为 iPhone 开发人工智能功能
item.description: The Information 周二援引一位直接知情人士的话报道称，苹果公司正在与阿里巴巴合作，为中国的 iPhone 用户开发和推出人工智能功能。【原文：Apple is partnering with Alibaba to develop and roll out AI features for iPhone users in China, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing one person with direct knowledge of the decision.】

item.title: 在医疗费用屡创新高的背景下，CVS Health 的扭亏为盈成为关注焦点
item.description: 本周，CVS Health 的投资者将密切关注新任首席执行官大卫-乔伊纳（David Joyner）带头采取的扭亏举措，以及这些举措对其医疗保险业务成本压力的影响。【原文：CVS Health investors will closely examine this week turnaround initiatives spearheaded by new CEO David Joyner and their impact on cost pressures in its health insurance business.】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官对资产和财富管理领域的收购持开放态度
item.description: 高盛集团首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周二表示，高盛将考虑在资产和财富管理领域进行收购，但会对任何交易进行严格筛选。【原文：Goldman Sachs would consider acquisitions in asset and wealth management, but would be highly selective about any deal, CEO David Solomon said on Tuesday.】

item.title: WK Kellogg 预测 2025 年利润将因削减成本而增长
item.description: WK Kellogg 周二预计全年利润将超过预期，并公布了好于预期的盈利报告，原因是这家早餐谷物食品生产商努力压缩成本，提高了利润率。【原文：WK Kellogg forecast annual profit above expectations on Tuesday and reported better-than-expected earnings as the breakfast cereal maker's efforts to clamp down on costs boosted its margins.】

item.title: 行政命令显示新的钢铝关税税率将于 3 月 12 日生效
item.description: 根据唐纳德-特朗普总统周一签署的行政命令，对美国进口钢铁和铝征收 25% 关税的新税率将于 3 月 12 日生效。【原文：The new 25% tariff rates on steel and aluminum imports into the United States are due to take effect on March 12, according to the executive orders signed by President Donald Trump on Monday.】

item.title: 美国、英国和澳大利亚就洛克比特勒索软件攻击事件将矛头指向总部位于俄罗斯的 Zservers 公司
item.description: 美国财政部周二表示，美国与澳大利亚和英国一道，以国家安全为由，将总部设在俄罗斯的 Zservers 服务提供商列为目标，因为该公司在支持 Lockbit 勒索软件攻击中扮演了重要角色。【原文：The United States joined Australia and Britain in targeting Russia-based Zservers service provider for its role in supporting the Lockbit ransomware attacks, the U.S. Department of Treasury said on Tuesday, citing national security concerns.】

item.title: Archer Aviation 在贝莱德支持下融资 3 亿美元
item.description: 空中出租车制造商 Archer Aviation 周二表示，该公司已在一轮融资中筹集了 3 亿美元，投资方包括贝莱德管理的账户等机构投资者。【原文：Air-taxi maker Archer Aviation said on Tuesday it has raised $300 million in a funding round that consisted of institutional investors including accounts managed by BlackRock .】

item.title: 由于关税问题和智能手机行业的困境，GlobalFoundries 预测第一季度业绩疲软
item.description: GlobalFoundries 周二预测第一季度营收和利润将低于华尔街预期，因为这家合约芯片制造商正在为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对汽车制造商客户征收关税的潜在影响和 2025 年充满挑战的智能手机市场做准备。【原文：GlobalFoundries on Tuesday forecast first-quarter revenue and profit below Wall Street estimates as the contract chipmaker braces for the potential impact of President Donald Trump's tariffs on automaker clients and a challenging smartphone market in 2025.】

item.title: 第二家顶级机构警告特朗普威胁世界银行三A评级
item.description: 惠誉已成为第二家警告称，如果唐纳德-特朗普撤销美国对世界银行和其他顶级多边贷款机构的支持，这些机构珍贵的三A信用评级将受到打击的顶级评级机构。【原文：Fitch has become the second top rating agency to warn that the prized triple-A credit scores of the World Bank and other top multilateral lenders will be hit if Donald Trump withdraws U.S. support for them.】

item.title: 标准普尔全球公司预计年度利润将高于预期，原因是对其产品的需求强劲
item.description: S&P Global 周二预计，2025 年调整后每股收益将高于华尔街预期，因为这家金融信息公司预计，在宏观经济不确定的情况下，市场对其数据和分析产品的需求将不断增加。【原文：S&P Global on Tuesday forecast 2025 adjusted earnings per share above Wall Street estimates, as the financial information company anticipated increasing demand for its data and analytics offerings amid macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 德国对美国贸易顺差再创新高
item.description: "基尔世界经济研究所的 Holger Goerg 说："很难想象会有比这更糟的时机。【原文："It would be hard to imagine worse timing," said Holger Goerg, from the Kiel Institute for the World Economy.】

item.title: 量子计算初创公司 QuEra 完成 2.3 亿美元融资
item.description: QuEra Computing 公司周二表示，这家中性原子量子公司已经完成了一轮超过 2.3 亿美元的融资，投资方包括谷歌量子人工智能业务部门和软银愿景基金（SoftBank Vision Fund）等。【原文：QuEra Computing said on Tuesday the neutral-atom quantum firm has completed a funding round in excess of $230 million, with investment from Google's Quantum AI business unit and SoftBank Vision Fund, among others.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士：LVMH 媒体部门暂不起诉马斯克旗下 X 公司
item.description: 据一位法院官员称，LVMH 旗下报业集团《回声报-巴黎人报》并不是法国媒体对埃隆-马斯克的 X 平台提起诉讼的一方，该集团此前曾表示将加入该诉讼，四位媒体行业消息人士称，LVMH 报社不再计划起诉该平台。【原文：LVMH-owned newspaper group Les Echos-Le Parisien is not party to a lawsuit involving French media against Elon Musk's X that it previously said it would join, according to a court official, and four media industry sources said the LVMH papers no longer planned to sue the platform.】

item.title: 美国和英国尚未签署巴黎人工智能峰会宣言
item.description: 美国和英国没有签署巴黎人工智能峰会题为 "关于包容性和可持续人工智能的声明 "的宣言。【原文：The United States and Britain have not signed the Paris AI Summit's declaration entitled 'Statement on Inclusive and Sustainable Artificial Intelligence'.】

item.title: 因冷却系统需求旺盛，开利利润超出预期
item.description: 开利全球（Carrier Global）周二公布的第四季度利润好于预期，主要得益于对其供暖、通风和空调产品以及售后维修服务的需求。【原文：Carrier Global on Tuesday reported a better-than-expected fourth-quarter profit, benefiting from demand for its heating, ventilating and air conditioning products and aftermarket repair services.】

item.title: 特朗普将废除家电和灯泡标准
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二在社交媒体上发文称，环境保护局将恢复以前对淋浴、马桶、洗碗机和其他电器的用水标准，以及以前对灯泡的用水标准。【原文：The Environmental Protection Agency will revert to previous water standards for showers, toilets, dishwashers and other appliances, and previous standards for light bulbs, U.S. President Donald Trump said in a social media post on Tuesday.】

item.title: 随着特朗普加密货币政策的成形，Binance 和美国证券交易委员会要求暂停法律战
item.description: Binance 和美国证券交易委员会以新成立的特别工作组的潜在影响为由，联合请求法院对监管机构针对该加密货币交易所的诉讼延期 60 天。【原文：Binance and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission have jointly asked a court for a 60-day stay on the regulator's lawsuit against the crypto exchange, citing the potential impact of a newly launched task force.】

item.title: 万豪全年业绩预期因中国经济放缓而受挫
item.description: 受大中华区酒店业绩不佳的影响，酒店运营商万豪国际集团周二预计 2025 年的利润和费用收入将低于华尔街预期，股价在盘前交易中下跌 1.6%。【原文：Hotel operator Marriott International forecast 2025 profit and fee revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, hurt by poor performance at its hotels in Greater China, sending shares down 1.6% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 可口可乐公司预测 2025 年有机收入增长不乐观
item.description: 可口可乐公司周二预测今年的有机收入增长将低于预期，这家饮料生产商在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税引发的不确定性中降低了预期。【原文：Coca-Cola on Tuesday forecast downbeat organic revenue growth this year on Tuesday, as the beverage maker tempers expectations amid uncertainty fueled by President Donald Trump's tariffs.】
